div.ab:
حفص بن عمر قمح ستّة وخمسين ونصف وربع في ســتّة وعشرين وربع ثلثة وخــمسيــن وثلثي وثلث ثــمــن
عبد الرّحمن بن موسى قمح ثمنية وربع في خمسة وستّين فدّان ونصف وثلثتمن
وله قمح ستّة وستّين وربع في ثلثة عشر ونصف وربع فدادين وربع وسدس تمن
وله قمح ستّة وربع في ستّة عشر وربع فدّان
وله قمح ثمنية وثلثين ونصف في أحد عشر وربع فدّان ونصفسدس
وله قمح أحد وعشرين ونصف في خمسة وثلثين فدّان ونصف وربع وتمن
وله قمح أربعة عشر وربع في عشرين وربع سدس وتمن
وله قمح تسعة في اثنين ثلثتمن
وله قمح أربعة عشر ونصف في تسعة عشر وربع ثلثي وسدس تمن
وله قمح ثلثة وعشــريــن ونصف وربع في عشرين ونصف وربع فدّان وسدس ونصفتمن
عبد الرّحمن وهو عيسى اثنين وعشرين ونصف في أربعين فدادين وربع
عشر من قصب سكّر
وله قصب سكّر أربعة وثلثين ونصف في ســتّة وثلثين ونصف ثلثة فدادين وثلث وتمن وسدس تمن
وله عشر من قصب سكّر سبعة وثلثين في تــســعة عشر وربع فدّان وثلثي وتمن
عيسى بن عمر كتّان تسعة وثلثين ونصف في تســعــة وثلثين ونــصــف ثلثة فدادين وثلث وربع وسدس تمن
منه كرم فدّان وعشر من حزر قصب سكّر
عشر
وله كتّان ارپعه ڤى پلپه وعشرپن سدس
ولــه كتّان اثنا عشر ونصف في تسعة عشر وربع نــصــف ونصف سدس وسدس تمن
نــصفسدس
وله عشر من كتّان واحد في ثمــنيــة سدس تمن
وله كتّان اثنين في ثلثة عشر نصفتمن
وله كرم ستّة في ثلثة عشر سدس وثلثتمن
وله كتّان تسعة في ثلثة عشر سدس وتمن
بوله الأسود قمح عشرين ونصف وربع في اثنا عشر نصف وتمن
وله قمح أربعة عشر في عشرة ثلث وسدس تمن
إسحق بن موسى ڤمح قمح سپعه عسر ورپع ڤى پلپه عسر وپصف ورنع پصف وپصف

ḥafṣu bnu ʿumar:in ** qamḥ:un sittaẗ:un wa ḫamsīna wa niṣf:un wa rubʿ:un fī sittaẗ:in wa ʿišrīna wa rubʿ:in ṯalāṯaẗ:un wa ḫamsīna wa ṯulṯay wa ṯulṯu ṯumn:in
ʿabdu ăr raḥmāni bnu mūsà qamḥ:un ṯamāniyaẗ:un wa rubʿ:un fī ḫamsaẗ:in wa sittīna faddān:un wa niṣf:un wa ṯulṯu tumn:in
wa la hu qamḥ:un sittaẗ:un wa sittīna wa rubʿ:un fī ṯalāṯaẗa ʿašara wa niṣf:in wa rubʿ:in fadādīnu wa rubʿ:un wa sudsu tumn:in
wa la hu qamḥ:un sittaẗ:un wa rubʿ:un fī sittaẗa ʿašara wa rubʿ:in faddān:un
wa la hu qamḥ:un ṯamāniyaẗ:un wa ṯalāṯīna wa niṣf:un fī ʾaḥada ʿašara wa rubʿ:in faddān:un wa niṣfu suds:in
wa la hu qamḥ:un ʾaḥad:un wa ʿišrīna wa niṣf:un fī ḫamsaẗ:in wa ṯalāṯīna faddān:un wa niṣf:un wa rubʿ:un wa tumn:un
wa la hu qamḥ:un ʾarbaʿaẗa ʿašara wa rubʿ:un fī ʿišrīna wa rubʿ:in suds:un wa tumn:un
wa la hu qamḥ:un tisʿaẗ:un fī ĭṯnayni ṯulṯu tumn:in
wa la hu qamḥ:un ʾarbaʿaẗa ʿašara wa niṣf:un fī tisʿaẗa ʿašara wa rubʿ:in ṯulṯay wa sudsu tumn:in
wa la hu qamḥ:un ṯalāṯaẗ:un wa ʿišrīna wa niṣf:un wa rubʿ:un fī ʿišrīna wa niṣf:in wa rubʿ:in faddān:un wa suds:un wa niṣfu tumn:in
ʿabdu ăr raḥmāni wa huwa ʿīsà ĭṯnayni wa ʿišrīna wa niṣf:un fī ʾarbaʿīna fadādīnu wa rubʿ:un
ʿašr:un min qaṣabi sukkar:in
wa la hu qaṣabu sukkar:in ʾarbaʿaẗ:un wa ṯalāṯīna wa niṣf:un fī sittaẗ:in wa ṯalāṯīna wa niṣf:in ṯalāṯaẗu fadādīna wa ṯulṯ:un wa tumn:un wa sudsu tumn:in
wa la hu ʿašr:un min qaṣabi sukkar:in sabʿaẗ:un wa ṯalāṯīna fī tisʿaẗa ʿašara wa rubʿ:in faddān:un wa ṯulṯay wa tumn:un
ʿīsà bnu ʿumar:in kattān:un tisʿaẗ:un wa ṯalāṯīna wa niṣf:un fī tisʿaẗ:in wa ṯalāṯīna wa niṣf:in ṯalāṯaẗu fadādīna wa ṯulṯ:un wa rubʿ:un wa sudsu tumn:in
min hu karm:un faddān:un wa ʿašr:un min ḥazr:in qaṣabu sukkar:in
ʿašr:un
wa la hu kattān:un ʾarbaʿaẗ:un fī ṯalāṯaẗ:in wa ʿišrīna suds:un wa niṣfu tumn:in
wa la hu kattān:un ĭṯnā ʿašara wa niṣf:un fī tisʿaẗa ʿašara wa rubʿ:in niṣf:un wa niṣfu suds:in wa sudsu tumn:in
*** *** ** niṣfu suds:in
wa la hu ʿašr:un min kattān:in wāḥid:un fī ṯamāniyaẗ:in sudsu tumn:in
wa la hu kattān:uni ĭṯnayni fī ṯalāṯaẗa ʿašara niṣfu tumn:in
wa la hu karm:un sittaẗ:un fī ṯalāṯaẗa ʿašara suds:un wa ṯulṯu tumn:in
wa la hu kattān:un tisʿaẗ:un fī ṯalāṯaẗa ʿašara suds:un wa tumn:un
būlahu ăl ʾaswadu qamḥ:un ʿišrīna wa niṣf:un wa rubʿ:un fī ĭṯnā ʿašara niṣf:un wa tumn:un
wa la hu qamḥ:un ʾarbaʿaẗa ʿašara fī ʿašaraẗ:in ṯulṯ:un wa sudsu tumn:in
ʾisḥāqu bnu mūsà sabʿaẗa qamḥ:un ʿašara wa rubʿ:un fī ṯalāṯaẗa ʿašara wa niṣf:in wa rubʿ:in niṣf:un wa niṣfu suds:in

Ḥafṣ b. ʿUmar, wheat: fifty-six and a half and a quarter into twenty s[ix] and a quarter, fi[fty] three and a third of an eighth.
ʿAbd ar-Raḥmân b. Mûsâ, wheat: eight and a quarter into sixty-five, one faddân and a half and a third of an eighth.
and he has wheat: sixty-six and a quarter into thirteen and a half and a quarter, faddâns and a qu[arter] and a sixth of an eighth.
and he has wheat: six and a quarter into sixteen (and) a quarter, one faddân.
and he has wheat: thirty-eight and a half into eleven and a quarter, one faddân and a half of a sixth.
and he has wheat: twenty-one and a half into thirty-five, one faddân and a half [and] a quarter and an eighth.
and he has wheat: fourteen and a quarter into twenty and a quarter, a sixth and an eighth.
and he has wheat: nine into two and a third of an eighth.
and he has wheat: fourteen and a half into nineteen and a quarter, two thirds and a sixth of an eighth.
and he has wheat: twen[ty]-three and a half <and> a quarter into twenty and a half and a quarter, one faddân and a sixth and a half of an eighth.
ʿAbd ar-Raḥmân and he (is called) ʿÎsâ, twenty-two and a half into forty, faddâns and a quarter.
ten (faddâns) of sugar-cane.
and he has sugar-cane: thirty four and a half into thirty-[s]ix and a half, three faddâns and a third and an eighth and a sixth of an eighth.
and he has ten of sugar-cane: thirty-seven into n[ine]teen and a quarter, one faddân and two thirds and an eighth.
ʿÎsâ b. ʿUmar, flax: thirty-nine and a ha[l]f into thirty-n[i]ne and a ha[l]f, three faddâns and a third and a quarter and a sixth of an eighth.
Thereof vine one faddân, and ten of chick-peas and of sugar-cane
ten (faddâns).
and he has flax: four into twenty-three, a sixth and a half of an eighth.
and [he] has flax: twelve and a half into nineteen and a quarter, a h[al]f and a half of a sixth and a sixth of an eighth.
........ a [h]alf of a sixth.
and he has ten of flax and one into ei[gh]t, a sixth of an eighth.
and he has flax: two into thirteen, a half of an eighth.
and he has vine: six into thirteen, a sixth and a third of an eighth.
and he has flax: nine into thirteen, a sixth and an eighth.
Bûle, the black, wheat: twenty and a half and a quarter into twelve, a half and an eighth.
and he has wheat: fourteen into ten, a third and a sixth of an eighth.
Isḥâq b. Mûsâ, wheat: seventeen <and> a quarter into thirteen and a half and a quarter, a half and a half of an eighth.
